formatted_address: 4 Seah Im Rd, HarbourFront Bus Interchange, Singapore 099115
name: Buzz

reviews.text:
I bought ciggs here at $17. When questioned about the price again asked him to open the cabinet to see the price. The stall attendant took a bottle of mineral water and tried to give it to me. And did not want to open the cabinet.

1. I used Scan qr so could not see the price.

2. Ytd I bought from 7-11 at harbourfront mrt cost $16.50. 2 days back my friend bought same brand different favour at $16.70.

3. Asked for receipt he did not want to give it to me at first till I insisted on wanted to check the price with the company

This store is mostly near bus stations and mrt stations. They sell candies, mouth fresheners, cold drinks and juices. Having this store here makes it very convenient for anyone to just grab some candy or drinks without going back all the way to vivocity or HarbourFront center mall. Mostly I like to buy my mouth freshener candy from here.

Stupid sales person
Cannot speak english
And dont know how to operate cashless machines

vicinity: 4 Seah Im Road, HarbourFront Bus Interchange, Singapore
